rules.natural: If Truck Alpha is operational in winter, then the fleet company is profitable in winter.
Whenever the fleet company is invested in winter, if it is expanding in winter, then it is profitable in winter.
Under the condition that the budget committee is approved in winter, the fleet company is invested in winter.
Either the fleet company is audited in winter or it is not the case that it is penalized in winter.
If Truck Alpha is maintained in winter, then it is operational in winter.
Should Truck Alpha be dispatched in winter, then it is not faulty in winter.
Given that Truck Alpha is stored in winter, it follows that it is not faulty in winter.
If Truck Alpha is scheduled in winter, then it is dispatched in winter.
Truck Alpha is scheduled in winter or it is unscheduled in winter.
Whenever Truck Alpha is unscheduled in winter, it is stored in winter.
Provided that the fleet company is efficient in winter, it is profitable in winter.
The fleet company is efficient in winter or it is expanding in winter.
If it is not the case that the budget committee is approved in winter, then the fleet company is penalized in winter.
Should Truck Alpha not be maintained in winter, then it is faulty in winter.

facts.natural: The fleet company is not audited in winter.
The fleet company is not profitable in winter.
